`A---==========================---`
`A---` `JTHE GREAT XTASY-GIVEAWAY` `A---`
`A---==========================---`

`LWhat is it?`
 `AThe xtasy.giveaway is Optix' departure`
 `Agift to the community. Everything I've`
 `Aworked for, all the rewards, all the`
 `Astolen goods, all of it given away for`
 `Afree.`

`LHow can I enter?`
 `AEntry to the giveaway is simple. All you`
 `Aneed to do is enter the following:`

   xtasy.giveaway {enter:true}

 `AEntry is entirely free.`

 `AKeep in mind that entry is limited to`
 `Aone` `DPER PERSON``A, not per user. Violators`
 `Awill be disqualified from the final`
 `Adrawing.`

`LWhat is there to get?`
 `AThe Prize Pool consists of the following:`

   `B-` `AA total sum of` `B4``VT``CGC`
   `B-` `AA` `PCON_A5V4H` `Alock`
   `B-` `AA` `Ttransfer_upgrade_v1` `Aof` count:3
   `B-` `Atransfer_vX upgrades with a total xfer-Power of` 1T39B717M889K488GC
   `B-` `L17x Tier-3 Locks` `Aincluding sn_w_usac, shfflr, l0g_wr1t3r and l0ckjaw`
   `B-` `A151x Tier-2 and Tier-1 locks`
   `B-` `AOver 500 more upgrades including glams`

`LHow are winners decided?`
 `ARegistration for the giveaway ends on` `J00.00 UTC on Saturday, 13th of April`

 `AA total of 3 random lottery drawings will be made:`
  `AFirst place may choose` `L3` `Aof the prizes listed above.`
  `ASecond place may choose` `J2` `Aof the prizes left.`
  `AThird place will automatically win` `Fwhatever is left``A.`
